name: RandomVerb
0:
”Alexa, tell Random Verb give me a random verb”
”Alexa, ask Random Verb to tell me another one”
”Alexa, tell Random Verb verb”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random verb
des:
Ask Alexa for a random verb, by saying "Alexa, tell Random Verb give me a random verb!". The skill will then return a random verb from a list of hundreds of common verbs!

You can use these random verbs as inspiration for jokes or stories!
